appeng.api.networking

Interface IGrid


  • public interface IGrid
    Gives you access to Grid based information. Don't Implement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      C      		 getCache(java.lang.Class<? extends IGridCache> iface)

      Get machines on the network.
      IReadOnlyCollection<java.lang.Class<? extends IGridHost>> getMachinesClasses()
      get a list of the diversity of classes, you can use this to better detect which machines your interested in, rather then iterating the entire grid to test them.
      IReadOnlyCollection<IGridNode> getNodes() 
      IGridNode getPivot()

      • getMachinesClasses

        @Nonnull
IReadOnlyCollection<java.lang.Class<? extends IGridHost>> getMachinesClasses()
        get a list of the diversity of classes, you can use this to better detect which machines your interested in, rather then iterating the entire grid to test them.
        Returns:
        IReadOnlyCollection of all available host types (Of Type IGridHost).

      • getMachines

        @Nonnull
IMachineSet getMachines(@Nonnull
                                 java.lang.Class<? extends IGridHost> gridHostClass)
        Get machines on the network.
        Parameters:
        gridHostClass - class of the grid host
        Returns:
        IMachineSet of all nodes belonging to hosts of specified class.

      • getNodes

        @Nonnull
IReadOnlyCollection<IGridNode> getNodes()
        Returns:
        IReadOnlyCollection for all nodes on the network, node visitors are preferred.

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        true if the last node has been removed from the grid.

      • getPivot

        @Nonnull
IGridNode getPivot()
        Returns:
        the node considered the pivot point of the grid.
